entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @Jim_Jordan This week conman trump & his lapdog @GOP cowardly henchmen lied to our country about coronavirus. YOU & your corrupt syncopates made our country that much more susceptible to death & illness from an avoidable virus. Thanks u ignorant, stupid, pos for endangering the entire US!😡
